name: Distance RUN
description:
Welcome to Distance RUN

This its a Serious game (Yes, that type of game exist), the main goal of this game was to teach the COVID-19 protocols and was published in a investigation article.

This was the first videogame I developed that didn't end up in the bank of forgotten projects.

The controls on desktop are as follows:

  • Mouse usage is required for menu
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Escape to pause

I lost the source code, so im sorry if there are bugs o glitches, sorry :c

Current version: 1.0.0.
